actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to establish a temporary embargo on the exportation of certain livestock feed grains.

summary.text: Establishes a temporary embargo on the exportation of specified livestock feed grains for one hundred and twenty days. Sets forth penalties for violations of the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish a temporary embargo on the exportation of certain livestock feed grains.
